RegExp — Higher-level abstraction over PCRE2 with JIT support¶

More info to appear here…

struct _reobj

Object having all internals required for RegExp operations

void *re¶

Compiled regexp

const char *restr¶

Re format (specfication) string

_Bool isjit¶

Flag indicating whether JIT is used

type reobj¶

Opaque object implemented with _reobj

enum re_err

Errors raised

enum re_flags

regexp flags abstraction

void re_free(reobj *obj)¶

Free previously allocated resourses for reobj object

Parameters

  • obj – pointer to reobj

reobj *re_init(const char *restr, unsigned long flags, enum re_err *error)¶

Allocate new regular expression object

Parameters

  • restr – string contatining regular expression pattern

  • flags – a series of flags as provided by re_flags

  • error – pointer to re_error where errror (if any is placed)

Returns

newly allocated reobj
